bike.description: 6066 hydroformed butted aluminum mainframe, OCLV co-molded carbon chainstays & seatstays, G2 Geometry

components.description: Fox F100RL, 100mm travel, custom G2 Geometry 46mm offset crown, air spring, external rebound adjustment
Bontrager XDX, 26x2.1 (55/53), tubeless ready, 120 TPI, aramid folding bead
Bontrager Race Lite, superlight hollow cromoly rails
Bontrager Race X Lite Carbon ACC, Carbon & Aluminum Shaft, 20mm Offset infinite adjust Bontrager head
Bontrager Race Lite Big Sweep, 640mm width, 12d backsweep, 31.8mm
Bontrager Race X Lite OS, 7d rise, 31.8mm
Avid Juicy 5, hydraulic disc, 160mm G2 Clean Sweep 6-bolt rotors
